alarm_filter_rule.alarm_filter_rule_description: Define criteria for filtering of alarms
alarm_filter_rule.empty_state_header: There is no criteria configured yet
alarm_filter_rule.empty_state_message: The alarm definitions will be showcased based on their respective alarm types and alarm approaches
alarm_filter_rule.specified_duration_or_count: Specified duration OR counts in period
alarm_filter_rule.save_fail_message: Error Occured while saving Filter Alarm Condition
alarm_filter_rule.alarm_correlation_rule_fetch_error: Error occured while fetching alarm correlation rule

flagged_event_rule.flagged_alarm_process_description: Define criteria for processing and assessment of flagged alarms
flagged_event_rule.evaluation_param_description: Assessment parameters consist of criteria assessed prior to other parameter checks.
flagged_event_rule.not_take_custody_description: If custody is not taken, wait, re-evaluate criteria. If criteria persist, create work order
flagged_event_rule.not_act_description: If no action is taken after custody, a time delay triggers criteria review. If criteria persist, proceed with work order
flagged_event_rule.unused_time_description: After custody, unused time from initial assessment appends to the next.
flagged_event_rule.background_color_description: The background color of the 'Assessment Time Remaining' widget on the flagged alarm summary of the evaluation team.
flagged_event_rule.wait_time_descriptions: Wait time after the flagged alarm is created before sending the update email.
flagged_event_rule.resend_time_description: Time interval to elapse after sending the initial email notification before resending the update email.
flagged_event_rule.wo_create_notification_description: Enabling Email notification will notify Site(s) regarding the creationof a Work Order
flagged_event_rule.flagged_alarm_closure_exception_descript: Warn/Restrict closure of open flagged alarm if the flagged alarm condition is still true.
flagged_event_rule.wo_create_description: Work order will be automatically generated on occurrence of flagged alarms
flagged_event_rule.wo_creation_notification_description: Send Email Notification on Auto creation of Work order
flagged_event_rule.template_field_mapping_description: Define the template for Work order creation & respective field mappings.
flagged_event_rule.fetch_error: Error Occured while fetching Flagged Alarm Process
flagged_event_rule.save_fail_message: Error Occured while saving Flagged Alarm Process
flagged_event_rule.slect_atleast_one_criterion: Please select at least one criterion for flagged event auto closure.
flagged_event_rule.please_configure_email: Please Configure Email Notification to Send
flagged_event_rule.email_to_sites_on_wo_creation: Email To Site On Workorder Creation
flagged_event_rule.auto_close_on_filtered_alarm_clear: Automatically close flagged alarm when the corresponding filtered alarm is cleared.
flagged_event_rule.auto_create_wo_description: Create workorder automatically on SLA breach

flagged_event.forward_success_message: Flagged Event Successfully Forwarded to Next Assessment Team
flagged_event.workorder_creation_success: Workorder For Flagged Event Created Successfully
flagged_event.workorder_creation_fail: Workorder Creation For Flagged Event Failed
flagged_event.refresh_to_reload_logs: Refresh to reload the latest logs.
flagged_event.suspend_conformation: Are you sure you want to suspend upcoming alarms?
